channel.title: XVoid the Game
channel.description: Recent content on XVoid the Game

item.title: GLSL Lightning Bullets in a metroidvania game
item.description: An in-depth look at implementing dynamic lighting effects for bullet shots in a Metroidvania game using GLSL.

item.title: Procedural c++ Design patterns
item.description: An exploration of procedural design patterns in C++, emphasizing efficiency and simplicity for indie game development.

item.title: GameDesign in a Metroidvania Game
item.description: An exploration of game design principles in metroidvania games, focusing on interconnected rooms, backtracking, and player guidance.
